name: Jane Mwangi
message: Love the platform! Would be great to have email notifications for project updates.

name: Peter Ochieng
message: The donation process is smooth. Can we add M-Pesa integration?

name: Grace Achieng
message: I've donated to multiple projects and love how transparent the tracking is. Keep it up!

name: James Kimani
message: As a regular donor, I'd appreciate a donor dashboard to see all my contributions in one place.

name: Anonymous
message: Great initiative for our community. The projects are well organized and easy to browse.

name: Mary Wanjiku
message: Can you add a feature to set up recurring monthly donations? Would make it easier to budget.

name: Andrew Kiptoo
message: The solar garden project is exactly what our neighborhood needs. Thank you for facilitating this!

name: Dr. Sarah Okonkwo
message: As a healthcare professional, I'm thrilled to support the Mobile Health Clinic. Would love to volunteer too!

name: George Odhiambo
message: The website loads fast and works well on my phone. Very user-friendly!

name: Margaret Kemunto
message: It would be nice to have project updates sent via SMS for those without reliable internet.

name: Alice Mwikali
message: The Arts Collective is changing lives! I've seen the kids in my neighborhood flourish because of it.

name: Quincy Mwangi
message: Can we get receipts for tax deduction purposes? That would help encourage more donations.

name: Yusuf Mwangi
message: The clean water station project is crucial for our area. Thank you for making this possible!

name: Richard Ouma
message: My son plays in the youth soccer program. The equipment drive has been a blessing. Asante sana!

name: Faith Muthoni
message: I'd love to see more education-focused projects. The Learning Lab is amazing!

name: Daniel Njoroge
message: Great platform but the search function could be improved. Hard to find specific projects.

name: Lucy Wambui
message: The progress bars on each project are motivating! Love seeing how close we are to goals.

name: Samuel Karanja
message: Consider adding a leaderboard for top donors. It might encourage friendly competition!

name: Agnes Chebet
message: The food pantry fridge has helped so many families in our neighborhood. God bless you all.

name: Victor Simiyu
message: Would be great to have WhatsApp sharing buttons for each project to spread the word easier.

name: Nancy Wangari
message: The tree planting initiative is wonderful. Our streets are getting greener every month!

name: Joseph Wekesa
message: Please add more payment options. Not everyone has a card - M-Pesa would reach more Kenyans.
